about_the_game: Although many seem to forget, the ball is actually the key element of a Blood Bowl match. This pack includes an exclusive ball for customizing your teams.

content_descriptors.notes: Blood Bowl 3 features Fantasy Violence and Blood.

detailed_description: Although many seem to forget, the ball is actually the key element of a Blood Bowl match. This pack includes an exclusive ball for customizing your teams.

name: Blood Bowl 3 - Brutal Ball Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2300 | AMD FX-4350
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 650, 1 GB | AMD Radeon HD 7770, 1 GB
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1050 Ti, 4 GB | AMD Radeon RX 570, 4 GB

short_description: Although many seem to forget, the ball is actually the key element of a Blood Bowl match. This pack includes an exclusive ball for customizing your teams.
